item.description:
Monday Night Zumba Madness 6pm – 7pm!

Wesley Hall at the First United Methodist Church

57 Peters Street North Andover, MA 01845 (Btwn 125 and 114- across from Panera, Burger King & Burtons)   

 

IT'S HERE! Dance Fitness with Amy is back on Monday nights at 6pm   Please join us at our newest location: Welsly Hall at First Untied Methodist Church 57 Peters Street North Andover, MA 01845  

OPEN TO THE PUBLIC!

Only $10 Walk-In Rate  

4 Class-Card for only $32!

***SPECIAL LIMITED TIME FREE CLASS GIVE-AWAY***
Each person that gets a friend to buy a 4-Class Card tonight will be entered in a drawing for a FREE 4-Class Card pass! (1 entry per successful referral/4 class card bought)

 "LIKE" "Zumba Dance with Amy" on FACEBOOK *Please always check online schedule for class changes or cancelations

More at:  www.amyfournierhealthandfitness.com

group.name: The Zumba Dance and Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Monday Night Zumba Madness!
